Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.flavor: A silvery ray of psychic compulsion lances into your foe’s innermost thoughts, dazing it long enough for you to assume control of its actions.
Dominate.aftereffect: The target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Dominate.onMiss: The target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).

Freedom of Movement.name: Freedom of Movement
Freedom of Movement.flavor: You generate a field of slippery force that aids your allies who are entangled in difficult situations.
Freedom of Movement.effect: You slide each target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. In addition, the immobilized, restrained, and slowed conditions end on each target, and if a target is grabbed, the grab ends.

Distract.name: Distract
Distract.flavor: Your mental barrage momentarily confuses an enemy.
Distract.target:
One creature
Level 11: One or two creatures
Level 21: One, two, or three creatures
Distract.effect: The target grants combat advantage to the next creature that attacks it before the end of your next turn.

Send Thoughts.name: Send Thoughts
Send Thoughts.flavor: You communicate telepathically with a creature.
Send Thoughts.target: One creature that shares a language with you
Send Thoughts.effect: You send a mental message of 25 words or fewer to the target. The target can respond in kind as a free action.

Dishearten.name: Dishearten
Dishearten.flavor: You insert thoughts of defeat into your foes’ minds, sapping their will to fight.
Dishearten.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.

Memory Hole.name: Memory Hole
Memory Hole.flavor: You sift through your foe’s mind for the mental representation of yourself within it and brutally rip it out.
Memory Hole.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you become invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.

Mind Thrust.name: Mind Thrust
Mind Thrust.flavor: You unleash a psychic assault on your foe’s mental pathways. You can increase the assault’s intensity to weaken your foe’s defenses.
Mind Thrust.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Mind Thrust.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a ranged basic attack.

Mental Trauma.name: Mental Trauma
Mental Trauma.flavor: You assault your enemy with a psychic bolt, impairing its ability to withstand further assaults on its mind.
Mental Trauma.effect: The target gains vulnerable 5 psychic (save ends).

Ravening Thought.name: Ravening Thought
Ravening Thought.flavor: You craft an insidious idea barbed with contradictions and horrors and project it into the mind of your foe. The thought then tries to invade other foes’ minds.
Ravening Thought.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Ravening Thought.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 3 psychic damage (save ends).
Ravening Thought.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target
Ravening Thought.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).

Intellect Fortress.name: Intellect Fortress
Intellect Fortress.flavor: A shimmering fortress of mind-generated force springs into being, deflecting certain attacks.
Intellect Fortress.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Intellect Fortress.effect: Choose a defense. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to that defense equal to your Charisma modifier.

Skill Empowerment.name: Skill Empowerment
Skill Empowerment.flavor: You send currents of energy into your ally’s mind and body, empowering your comrade to achieve exceptional deeds.
Skill Empowerment.effect: Choose a skill. The target gains a +3 power bonus to checks using that skill until the end of the encounter.

Betrayal.name: Betrayal
Betrayal.flavor: You weaken your foe’s sense of self and force it to betray a comrade.
Betrayal.onHit: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier to a square adjacent to an enemy. The target then makes a melee basic attack as a free action against that enemy, with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier. The target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Id Insinuation.name: Id Insinuation
Id Insinuation.flavor: You send tendrils of thought burrowing into your foes’ minds, compromising their resilience. By increasing the size of the tendrils, you can make your foes more susceptible to harm.
Id Insinuation.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. If an attack hits the target’s Fortitude before the end of your next turn, that attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Crisis of Identity.name: Crisis of Identity
Crisis of Identity.flavor: You pull on the invisible threads of your foe's self-knowledge, scrambling the creature's mind.
Crisis of Identity.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice, with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Hypnotic Pulse.name: Hypnotic Pulse
Hypnotic Pulse.flavor: You emanate a hypnotic ripple of psychic influence among your foes.
Hypnotic Pulse.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Hypnotic Pulse.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Mind Shadow.name: Mind Shadow
Mind Shadow.flavor: Your enemies’ ability to pay attention to you fades. You recede to the edge of their vision as nothing but a blurred shadow.
Mind Shadow.effect: Until you hit any creature with an attack or until the end of the encounter, you are invisible to your enemies if you are not their nearest enemy.

Steadfast Stanchion.name: Steadfast Stanchion
Steadfast Stanchion.flavor: You clamp invisible wedges of force onto space itself, tethering yourself and your allies against forced movement.
Steadfast Stanchion.effect: You become immune to forced movement until the end of your next turn. In addition, your allies are immune to forced movement while within 5 squares of you. If you move, the effect ends.

Force Grasp.name: Force Grasp
Force Grasp.flavor: You grasp your foe with a hand of shimmering force, slowing it. You can hold the foe in place if you infuse the hand with enough power.
Force Grasp.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Mind Break.name: Mind Break
Mind Break.flavor: You lance your foe’s mind with mental trauma, which makes it vulnerable to psychic damage. If you choose, you can strip away its psychic resistances.
Mind Break.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target gains vulnerability to psychic damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Mind Break.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a ranged basic attack.

Mind Blast.name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.flavor: You blast your foes with a torrent of psychic energy, which sends shock waves through the air like heat waves off desert sand.
Mind Blast.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Sensory Onslaught.name: Sensory Onslaught
Sensory Onslaught.flavor: You overload your foe’s senses with a blaring, flashing, odorous mental onslaught that only it can perceive.
Sensory Onslaught.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Sensory Onslaught.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and to all defenses, and it can’t take opportunity actions.

Intellect Leech.name: Intellect Leech
Intellect Leech.flavor: You force a short-range telepathic connection on your foe. Every time your enemy’s mind is damaged, you draw invigorating energy from it.
Intellect Leech.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target takes psychic damage while within 10 squares of you, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Mind over Flesh.name: Mind over Flesh
Mind over Flesh.flavor: You draw on your reservoir of psionic power to bolster yourself against a debilitating effect.
Mind over Flesh.trigger: An effect dazes, dominates, or stuns you
Mind over Flesh.effect: You make a saving throw against the triggering effect. If you save, the triggering effect doesn’t affect you.

Dual Hallucination.name: Dual Hallucination
Dual Hallucination.flavor: You pull disquieting images from your foes’ minds and combine the images into horrific hallucinations, which you use to disorient those foes.
Dual Hallucination.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Mind Wipe.name: Mind Wipe
Mind Wipe.flavor: You fray your foe’s offensive abilities with a psychic lance of disruption.
Mind Wipe.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty equal to your Charisma modifier to the next attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn.

Psychic Crush.name: Psychic Crush
Psychic Crush.flavor: You crush some of your enemies’ mental processes. The enemies’ bodies spasm with the pain that lingers.
Psychic Crush.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). If the target is bloodied, it is also dazed (save ends).
Psychic Crush.onMiss: Half damage. If the target is bloodied, it is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Psychofeedback.name: Psychofeedback
Psychofeedback.flavor: You sever one of your foe’s mental pathways, causing searing pain. You can exploit that mental wound whenever the foe harms your friends, renewing your own vitality.
Psychofeedback.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). While the target is dazed by this power, you gain temporary hit points equal to 1d8 + your Charisma modifier whenever the target deals damage to another creature.

Precognitive Step.name: Precognitive Step
Precognitive Step.flavor: You can see the shades of things to come a heartbeat before they occur, granting you a sliver of time in which to alter events.
Precognitive Step.effect: Roll a d20. Once during this encounter, you can use that roll’s result in place of one of your attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, or ability checks or in place of an enemy’s attack roll against you.

Psychic Chirurgery.name: Psychic Chirurgery
Psychic Chirurgery.flavor: You send a charge of psionic energy into yourself or an ally, delaying an adverse effect.
Psychic Chirurgery.trigger: You or an ally is subjected to an effect that a save can end.
Psychic Chirurgery.effect: The target isn’t subjected to the effect until the end of his or her next turn and can’t start making saving throws against the effect until after that turn.

Forced Opportunity.name: Forced Opportunity
Forced Opportunity.flavor: You jolt your foe’s psyche, disrupting its concentration and allowing an ally to strike the foe during the lapse. By channeling more psionic energy, you can create an opening for several allies to exploit.
Forced Opportunity.onHit: Each of your allies adjacent to the target can make an opportunity attack against it as a free action, with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Psychic Brand.name: Psychic Brand
Psychic Brand.flavor: You manifest a glowing symbol over your enemy’s head. The symbol moves with your foe, helping reveal its location. At your choosing, the symbol can intensify your foe’s pain.
Psychic Brand.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot benefit from concealment or total concealment, and it gains vulnerability to all damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Psychic Brand.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a ranged basic attack.

Psychic Leech.name: Psychic Leech
Psychic Leech.flavor: You plunge a thread of command into your foe’s mind, forcing the foe to turn on its ally. You draw psionic power from your foe, and you gain vitality if the foe hits its companion.
Psychic Leech.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice. If that attack hits, you gain temporary hit points equal to the damage it deals.
Psychic Leech.onMiss: The target makes a basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice. If that attack hits, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Mind Over Earth.name: Mind Over Earth
Mind Over Earth.flavor: The ground falls away as you effortlessly propel yourself upward.
Mind Over Earth.effect: You gain a fly speed of 8 and can hover until the end of the encounter.

Rejuvenate the Mind.name: Rejuvenate the Mind
Rejuvenate the Mind.flavor: When you catch your breath, you experience a rush of psionic vigor.

Daggers of Pain.name: Daggers of Pain
Daggers of Pain.flavor: You send shards of psychic aggression ripping through your enemies, scarring their minds. When those foes move, you can intensify the pain.
Daggers of Pain.onHit: 4d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier for each square it moves on its next turn.

Sudden Control.name: Sudden Control
Sudden Control.flavor: With a thought, you force your foe to attack one of its companions. With greater concentration, your control becomes absolute.
Sudden Control.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn. Until the domination ends, the target gains a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Mind Switch.name: Mind Switch
Mind Switch.flavor: You project a fragment of your consciousness into your enemy’s mind, disorienting the enemy and creating a temporary clone of your will within it that you can use to channel your magic.
Mind Switch.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage and is stunned (save ends both). While the target is stunned by this power, you can use a square in the target’s space as the origin square of your psionic implement powers.
Mind Switch.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Thrall.name: Thrall
Thrall.flavor: Psychic energy pierces your foe’s sense of self, distracting the foe so that you can assume control of its actions.
Thrall.aftereffect: 1d10 psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.

Concussive Detonation.name: Concussive Detonation
Concussive Detonation.flavor: You unleash a blast of force, which tears into your foes, leaving them off balance. You can focus the blast to knock your enemies senseless.
Concussive Detonation.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Psionic Veil.name: Psionic Veil
Psionic Veil.flavor: You pull a veil over your foes’ senses, hiding yourself and your allies. With a little more power, you can blind your enemies.
Psionic Veil.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Microcosm.name: Microcosm
Microcosm.flavor: You blast your foe with a cacophony of conflicting images and muscle commands, replacing its perception of reality with sights, sounds, and smells that don’t exist.
Microcosm.onHit: 5d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is deafened (save ends), blinded (save ends), and slowed (save ends).
Microcosm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Microcosm.effect: Until the power’s effects end on the target, you can slide it a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier as a minor action once per round.

Soul Break.name: Soul Break
Soul Break.flavor: You sear your foe with an ebony ray of psychic compulsion, giving it the choice to remain under your domination or pay a terrible price.
Soul Break.aftereffect: The target chooses either to be stunned until the end of its next turn or to take 3d10 + your Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
Soul Break.onMiss: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Far Hand.name: Far Hand
Far Hand.flavor: You lift an object into the air with the power of your mind.
Far Hand.target: One object that weighs 20 pounds or less and isn’t carried by another creature
Far Hand.effect: You either move the target to a square within range or manipulate it. When you move the target with this power, you can cause the target to remain aloft until the end of your next turn. If you are holding the target when you use this power, you can put it into a container that’s on your person and simultaneously move a second object that you’re carrying to your hand. The second object then becomes the target if it weighs 20 pounds or less.
Far Hand.sustainMinor: You either move the target to a square within range or manipulate it.

Forceful Push.name: Forceful Push
Forceful Push.flavor: With a focused thought, your mental push becomes physical force, moving a creature in the direction you choose.
Forceful Push.effect:
You slide the target 1 square, but not into hindering terrain.
Level 11: You slide the target 2 squares.
Level 21: You slide the target 3 squares.

Force Punch.name: Force Punch
Force Punch.flavor: You punch your foe telekinetically, pushing it and its allies away from you.
Force Punch.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier + Wisdom modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone. In addition, you push the target and each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

Kinetic Trawl.name: Kinetic Trawl
Kinetic Trawl.flavor: You catch your foe in a net of constricting force and draw the foe toward you.
Kinetic Trawl.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Kinetic Trawl.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a ranged basic attack.

Hand of Caution.name: Hand of Caution
Hand of Caution.flavor: You forge a barrier of hand-shaped force. When your foe moves too close to you, the barrier repels it.
Hand of Caution.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action to push the target 1 square when the target is within 5 squares of you. This effect ends if you end your turn adjacent to the target.

Telekinetic Anchor.name: Telekinetic Anchor
Telekinetic Anchor.flavor: You drive an unseen spike of force into space itself, anchoring creatures in place and causing them harm if they struggle.
Telekinetic Anchor.effect: Each target takes 5 force damage the first time it moves on its next turn.

Telekinetic Lift.name: Telekinetic Lift
Telekinetic Lift.flavor: You lift a creature or an object into the air with the power of your mind and can hold it there or move it as you wish.
Telekinetic Lift.target: One ally, helpless enemy, or object that weighs 400 pounds or less and isn’t carried by another creature
Telekinetic Lift.effect: You slide the target 3 squares in any direction, even into the air. The target remains aloft and is immobilized until the end of your next turn. You can end this effect as a free action, and it ends if you end your turn out of range of the target. If the target is a creature, it can end the effect as a minor action.
Telekinetic Lift.sustainMinor: The target remains aloft and is immobilized until the end of your next turn, and you can slide the target 3 squares in any direction. Alternatively, you can drop the target and then use the power on a new target.

Transport Self.name: Transport Self
Transport Self.flavor: With a thought, you transport yourself to a position that better suits your desires.
Transport Self.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Burning Flux.name: Burning Flux
Burning Flux.flavor: You telekinetically grasp empty space and shape it into a whirlwind of burning, grasping filaments that sears nearby enemies.
Burning Flux.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is totally obscured, and any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Force Hammer.name: Force Hammer
Force Hammer.flavor: You fashion a hammer of force to smash your enemies and either slow them or knock them to the ground.
Force Hammer.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone.

Shredding Ribbons.name: Shredding Ribbons
Shredding Ribbons.flavor: A mass of whirling, shredding, translucent ribbons of force erupts into existence at your behest. The razor-sharp tendrils repeatedly slice into your foes.
Shredding Ribbons.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes force damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Telekinetic Maul.name: Telekinetic Maul
Telekinetic Maul.flavor: You form a maul of telekinetic force and slam it into your foe, knocking that enemy backward.
Telekinetic Maul.onHit: 3d12 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). If you push the target into difficult terrain, the target falls prone.
Telekinetic Maul.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Telekinetic Screen.name: Telekinetic Screen
Telekinetic Screen.flavor: You mentally project a thin layer of force around yourself to ward off a deadly attack.
Telekinetic Screen.trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you
Telekinetic Screen.effect: The attack’s damage is reduced by 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

Cranial Disturbance.name: Cranial Disturbance
Cranial Disturbance.flavor: You generate a spike of expanding force within your enemy, disorienting that foe and knocking it off balance. You can expand the spike to have it explode, affecting more foes.
Cranial Disturbance.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. In addition, each creature adjacent to the target takes force damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Dread Spiral.name: Dread Spiral
Dread Spiral.flavor: You focus your thoughts on your foe, binding it with unbreakable force that lets you move it as you wish. By exerting more willpower, you can move your enemy farther.
Dread Spiral.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Clear the Slate.name: Clear the Slate
Clear the Slate.flavor: You create huge gauntlets of mental force that snatch creatures and move them into positions that you desire.
Clear the Slate.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you slide the target a number squares equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Clear the Slate.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Mind Cannon.name: Mind Cannon
Mind Cannon.flavor: You rend your foe with a thunderous explosion of force, which sends a shock wave into nearby creatures.
Mind Cannon.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force and thunder damage. You push the primary target 1 square, and it is deafened (save ends).
Mind Cannon.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Mind Cannon.secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst other than the primary target

Force Bubble.name: Force Bubble
Force Bubble.flavor: You create invisible spheres of force around yourself and your nearby allies. The spheres mute or even stop dangerous energy that rages beyond them.
Force Bubble.target: You and each ally in the burst
Force Bubble.effect: Choose cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder. Until the end of your next turn, each target gains resistance to that damage type, but only when the damage is from ranged or area attacks. The resistance equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Sky Hook.name: Sky Hook
Sky Hook.flavor: You direct your telekinetic focus on yourself and raise yourself into the air.
Sky Hook.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you have a fly speed equal to your speed (hover; altitude limit 2).

Concussion Burst.name: Concussion Burst
Concussion Burst.flavor: The air ripples as you knock your foes down with a wave of pummeling force.
Concussion Burst.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target falls prone.

Thunder Tether.name: Thunder Tether
Thunder Tether.flavor: You focus your will and wrench space around your foes, tethering them in place. Any of them that try to move pay a thunderous price.
Thunder Tether.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Thunder Tether.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage. If the target moves before the start of your next turn, it and each creature adjacent to it at the start of that move take thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Thunder Tether.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.

Crushing Bludgeon.name: Crushing Bludgeon
Crushing Bludgeon.flavor: You manifest a massive fist of unstoppable force and bludgeon your foe with it, slowing that enemy’s movements.
Crushing Bludgeon.onHit: 4d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is slowed (saved ends).
Crushing Bludgeon.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Imprison.name: Imprison
Imprison.flavor: You release an explosion of force that sends your foes spinning away. You then reshape that force into shackles to bind your enemies in place.
Imprison.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage. You slide the target a number of squares equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier, and it is immobilized (save ends).
Imprison.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Telekinetic Boost.name: Telekinetic Boost
Telekinetic Boost.flavor: You focus your mental energy on creating a conduit for your allies’ movement.
Telekinetic Boost.effect: You create a zone in an unoccupied square within range. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When any ally enters the zone, you can use a free action to slide that ally a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can slide the ally in any direction, even into the air.
Telekinetic Boost.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you can move it to a different unoccupied square within range.

Crystalline Bonds.name: Crystalline Bonds
Crystalline Bonds.flavor: You construct a lattice of binding crystalline force. By increasing the lattice’s strength, you can induce pain in the foes inside the lattice.
Crystalline Bonds.onHit: 3d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Crystalline Bonds.keyword: This power gains the Force keyword.

Shield Crack.name: Shield Crack
Shield Crack.flavor: Lightning erupts from your brow in all directions, battering the defenses of all in its path. By refining the shape of the arc, you can have it strike only those you choose.
Shield Crack.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Wisdom modifier.

Crisis of Breath.name: Crisis of Breath
Crisis of Breath.flavor: You telekinetically plug your foe’s airways, causing the creature to suffocate, and interfering with its other vital functions.
Crisis of Breath.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). The target takes a -4 penalty to its first saving throw against this ongoing damage.
Crisis of Breath.sustainMinor: The target takes a -2 penalty to its next saving throw against the ongoing damage.

Shred Reality.name: Shred Reality
Shred Reality.flavor: With an explosion of telekinetic force, you rip a temporary hole in reality that pulls at friend and foe alike. One of them is briefly sucked into that void.
Shred Reality.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you teleport the target 3 squares.
Shred Reality.secondaryTarget: One creature hit by the primary attack
Shred Reality.secondaryOnHit: The target is removed from play. At the end of your next turn, the target reappears in an unoccupied space of your choice within 5 squares of you and is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Shred Reality.secondaryOnMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Through the Walls.name: Through the Walls
Through the Walls.flavor: You alter the physical form of those nearby, allowing you and your friends to walk through walls.
Through the Walls.target: You and each ally in the burst
Through the Walls.effect: Each target is phasing until the end of your next turn.

Warding Shield.name: Warding Shield
Warding Shield.flavor: As your enemy’s assault washes toward you, you create a field of psionic energy to protect yourself and your allies.
Warding Shield.trigger: An enemy targets you with an area or a close attack
Warding Shield.target: You and each ally in the burst
Warding Shield.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a bonus to AC, Fortitude, and Reflex equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Cruel Crush.name: Cruel Crush
Cruel Crush.flavor: You smash your foe to the ground with crushing telekinetic force. By channeling more power, you can grind the foe into the ground.
Cruel Crush.onHit: 4d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone. It cannot stand up until the end of your next turn.

Space Vortex.name: Space Vortex
Space Vortex.flavor: You tear a momentary vortex in space above your foe and hurl the foe through it.
Space Vortex.onHit: 2d12 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is removed from play. At the end of your next turn, the target reappears in an unoccupied space of your choice within 10 squares of you.

Forest of Exclusion.name: Forest of Exclusion
Forest of Exclusion.flavor: Strands of force ripple outward from you, battering your foes away. With focus, you can maintain the field of energy to continue pushing away those who wish you harm.
Forest of Exclusion.onHit: 4d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 4 squares.
Forest of Exclusion.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Forest of Exclusion.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Any enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 5 force damage and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Telekinetic Bombard.name: Telekinetic Bombard
Telekinetic Bombard.flavor: You project a shimmering dart of deadly force toward your foes. It explodes, flinging victims away.
Telekinetic Bombard.onHit: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares from the center of the burst equal to your Wisdom modifier. If the target ends adjacent to blocking terrain, the target takes 3d6 extra damage.
Telekinetic Bombard.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares from the center of the burst.

Claws of Force.name: Claws of Force
Claws of Force.flavor: Claws of force erupt around your enemy. By increasing the claws’ strength, you can keep your foe close or hold it in place.
Claws of Force.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Intrusive Spear.name: Intrusive Spear
Intrusive Spear.flavor: You fashion a spear of telekinetic force and launch it at your foe. The spear strikes with such might that the foe’s defenses falter.
Intrusive Spear.target: Two creatures adjacent to each other
Intrusive Spear.onHit: 4d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Clasp of the Psion.name: Clasp of the Psion
Clasp of the Psion.flavor: You cause two shimmering, gigantic hands of force to smash your foes and grasp them in place.
Clasp of the Psion.onHit: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Clasp of the Psion.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (saved ends).
Clasp of the Psion.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any enemy that is hit by a force power is also immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Tear the World.name: Tear the World
Tear the World.flavor: You strike your enemies with an overwhelming blast of telekinetic force that drives your foes away and almost tears the fabric of reality itself.
Tear the World.onHit: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and ongoing 15 force damage (save ends).
Tear the World.aftereffect: If the target is within 10 squares of you, you push it a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Tear the World.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 3 squares.

Shaped Consciousness.name: Shaped Consciousness
Shaped Consciousness.flavor: You shape a fragment of your consciousness, bringing it into existence to extend your scope on the battlefield.
Shaped Consciousness.effect:
You conjure a fragment of your consciousness in an unoccupied square in the burst. The fragment lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a minor action. The fragment occupies its square, and you and your allies can move through it. When you take a move action, you can also move your fragment a number of squares equal to your speed. You can see, hear, and use psion powers as if you were in your fragment’s space.
    Your fragment can be attacked. If it takes any damage, it disappears. It is immune to your attacks.

Minor Creation.name: Minor Creation
Minor Creation.effect: You conjure a nonliving, nonmagical object that appears within range, either in an unoccupied square, in your hand, or in an ally’s hand. The object lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a free action. The object you conjure is a single weapon or an item listed under “Adventuring Gear,” page 222 of the Player’s Handbook. At the Dungeon Master’s discretion, you can create some other nonmagical object no larger than one that a Medium creature can carry.

Dimensional Scramble.name: Dimensional Scramble
Dimensional Scramble.flavor: Your attack causes space to jumble and fragment, scattering creatures into different positions.
Dimensional Scramble.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport the target to another square in or adjacent to the burst.

Force Shard.name: Force Shard
Force Shard.flavor: A shard of pure force appears in the air at your mental command, creating a hazard for your foes.

bonusPower.name: Force Shard Attack
bonusPower.requirement: The power Force Shard must be active in order to use this power.

Force Shard.effect: You conjure a force shard as above, and you can also move the force shard 5 squares as a move action.

Mind Lock.name: Mind Lock
Mind Lock.flavor: Your attack locks down an enemy’s ability to focus, hindering its movement.
Mind Lock.onHit: As above, and the target also cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

Living Missile.name: Living Missile
Living Missile.flavor: You bind an enemy with a thought, then hurl it into another foe.
Living Missile.effect: Before the secondary attack, you slide the primary target 10 squares.
Living Missile.requirement: The power Living Missile must be active in order to use this power.  This power may be used once per round.
Living Missile.secondaryTarget: One creature adjacent to the primary target at any point during the slide
Living Missile.secondaryOnHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the secondary target falls prone. The primary target takes half damage and falls prone.
Living Missile.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the primary target falls prone.

Psychic Dissolution.name: Psychic Dissolution
Psychic Dissolution.flavor: A psychic wind scours your foe, shredding it to a dark haze.
Psychic Dissolution.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Psychic Dissolution.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Psychic Dissolution.effect: When the target takes ongoing damage from this power, each square adjacent to the target becomes lightly obscured until the end of your next turn.

Summon Thought Servant.name: Summon Thought Servant
Summon Thought Servant.flavor: The power of your mind summons an obedient servant that can fight with you or come to an ally’s aid.
Summon Thought Servant.effect: As above, and you can give the thought servant the following additional command.
Summon Thought Servant.standardAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. AC; 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
Summon Thought Servant.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. AC; 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
Summon Thought Servant.opportunityAction: Triggered when a dying ally adjacent to the servant starts its turn; targets the triggering ally; the servant makes a Heal check to stabilize the target or to allow the target to use his or her second wind.

Telepathic Projection.name: Telepathic Projection
Telepathic Projection.flavor: You force your own will into an enemy’s mind, manipulating the foe like a puppet under your control.
Telepathic Projection.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is subject to your telepathic projection (save ends). While the target is affected by your telepathic projection, when you start your turn, the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a target you choose.
Telepathic Projection.onMiss: Half damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack against a random creature. If this attack targets one of your allies, the target takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll.

Borrow Training.name: Borrow Training
Borrow Training.flavor: You reach into an ally’s mind to borrow the knowledge you need.
Borrow Training.effect: Choose one skill in which the target is trained and you are not. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to skill checks with the chosen skill.

Buoyancy of Thought.name: Buoyancy of Thought
Buoyancy of Thought.flavor: Your mind catches you whenever you might fall.
Buoyancy of Thought.trigger: You take falling damage or an attack knocks you prone
Buoyancy of Thought.effect: You reduce any falling damage by a number of points equal to your level, and you are not knocked prone by the triggering attack or the triggering fall.

Dimensional Stowaway.name: Dimensional Stowaway
Dimensional Stowaway.flavor: You establish a psychic connection to an ally, bringing it with you when you teleport.
Dimensional Stowaway.trigger: You teleport or a creature teleports you
Dimensional Stowaway.target: One ally adjacent to you before the teleport
Dimensional Stowaway.effect: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to your destination.

Mind Shroud.name: Mind Shroud
Mind Shroud.flavor: You slow your movement to shroud yourself in a shimmering haze, clouding all creatures’ minds against your presence.
Mind Shroud.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you have superior cover and you are slowed.

Crushing Turmoil.name: Crushing Turmoil
Crushing Turmoil.flavor: Your attack crushes your enemy’s confidence and resolve, hindering its ability to shrug off debilitating effects.
Crushing Turmoil.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Fuse Form.name: Fuse Form
Fuse Form.flavor: The energy of your mind scours your foe to hinder its movement, and it can bind multiple enemies together with unbreakable psychic bonds.
Fuse Form.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and if the primary target moves more than 2 squares on its next turn, it takes 5 damage. You make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Fuse Form.secondaryOnHit: 5 + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the secondary target cannot move to a square that is not adjacent to the primary target, and the primary target cannot move to a square that is not adjacent to one or more secondary targets.

Kinetic Trip.name: Kinetic Trip
Kinetic Trip.flavor: Your attack constrains your enemy, bowling it over unless it stands its ground.
Kinetic Trip.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage. On its next turn, if the target makes a move other than a shift, it falls prone.

Psychic Anomaly.name: Psychic Anomaly
Psychic Anomaly.flavor: You conjure a shimmering anomaly of pure psionic energy, which disrupts the minds of nearby foes.
Psychic Anomaly.effect: As above, and your allies can flank with the psychic anomaly.
Psychic Anomaly.requirement: The power Psychic Anomaly must be active in order to use this power.
Psychic Anomaly.trigger: An enemy starts its turn in a square adjacent to the anomaly
Psychic Anomaly.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Force Spheres.name: Force Spheres
Force Spheres.flavor: Your power focuses into protective spheres of shimmering force that can be hurled at your enemies with a thought.
Force Spheres.requirement: The power Force Spheres must be active in order to use this power.  This power may be used once per round.
Force Spheres.onHit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target falls prone.

Inflicted Mindscape.name: Inflicted Mindscape
Inflicted Mindscape.flavor: As you reach into your enemies’ minds, the ground beneath their feet becomes a clutching mire of madness.
Inflicted Mindscape.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Inflicted Mindscape.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Inflicted Mindscape.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that ends its turn within the zone is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Inflicted Mindscape.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Summon Ebony Stinger.name: Summon Ebony Stinger
Summon Ebony Stinger.flavor: Wisps of black shadow coalesce to form a, monstrous scorpion under your control.
Summon Ebony Stinger.effect: As above, and any creature grabbed by the ebony stinger takes a -4 penalty to checks to escape the stinger’s grab.
Summon Ebony Stinger.standardAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the stinger grabs the target.
Summon Ebony Stinger.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 1d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Thunderous Exit.name: Thunderous Exit
Thunderous Exit.flavor: A blast of thunder rocks your enemies, allowing you to escape in its booming wake.

Explosive Force.name: Explosive Force
Explosive Force.flavor: Your force attack releases a pulse of energy that leaves nearby creatures vulnerable to follow-up attacks.
Explosive Force.trigger: You hit an enemy within 10 squares of you with an unaugmented psion at-will force attack power
Explosive Force.target: Each creature adjacent to the enemy you hit
Explosive Force.effect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Intellect Prism.name: Intellect Prism
Intellect Prism.flavor: Motes of light swirl to form a crystalline prism in the air, sharpening your senses and extending your presence on the battlefield.
Intellect Prism.effect:
You conjure an intellect prism in an unoccupied square within range. The prism lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a minor action. You can use your attack powers as if you were in the prism’s space. As a move action, you can move the prism a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier. While the prism is adjacent to you, you gain a +3 bonus to Perception checks.
    The prism can be targeted by melee and ranged attacks. It has a +4 bonus to all defenses and hit points equal to your healing surge value. If the prism drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and you are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Mental Void.name: Mental Void
Mental Void.flavor: When an enemy strikes at your mind, the attack only boosts your resilience.
Mental Void.trigger: An enemy attack targets your Will
Mental Void.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack misses, the attacker grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Shared Recovery.name: Shared Recovery
Shared Recovery.flavor: You tap into the mind of an ally, letting his or her recovery grant a temporary boost to your own vitality.
Shared Recovery.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points or succeeds on a saving throw
Shared Recovery.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Intelligence modifier.

Ectoplasmic Servant.name: Ectoplasmic Servant
Ectoplasmic Servant.flavor: A conjured shower of glistening slime takes humanoid shape at your command, spraying your foes with caustic acid.

bonusPower.name: Ectoplasmic Servant Attack
bonusPower.requirement: The power Ectoplasmic Servant must be active in order to use this power.
bonusPower.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Ectoplasmic Servant.effect: You conjure an ectoplasmic servant as above, and any enemy that starts its turn in or adjacent to the servant’s space is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Ego Whip.name: Ego Whip
Ego Whip.flavor: Your psychic attack hits like the crack of a whip, flooding your foe with feelings of crushing worthlessness.
Ego Whip.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, all defenses, and saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Kinetic Buffer.name: Kinetic Buffer
Kinetic Buffer.flavor: A burst of force protects you even as it slams into your enemies and knocks them back.
Kinetic Buffer.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Matter Dissipation.name: Matter Dissipation
Matter Dissipation.flavor: Your attack leaves an area of ghostly translucence that tears at creatures lingering within it.
Matter Dissipation.effect: As above, but any enemy that ends its turn within the zone takes the damage.

Echoing Boom.name: Echoing Boom
Echoing Boom.flavor: You unleash a burst of devastating thunder whose booming echo lets you scatter foes across the battlefield.
Echoing Boom.effect: The secondary target takes 5 thunder damage, and you slide the secondary target 1 square.
Echoing Boom.requirement: The power Echoing Boom must be active in order to use this power.
Echoing Boom.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you is hit by an attack

Inflict Pain.name: Inflict Pain
Inflict Pain.flavor: Your thoughts work their way into a foe’s mind like razor-sharp needles, crippling it with excruciating pain.
Inflict Pain.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends both).
Inflict Pain.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Malicious Lightning.name: Malicious Lightning
Malicious Lightning.flavor: A burst of lightning lingers as four sizzling motes, each of which erupts at your command.
Malicious Lightning.effect: You conjure four lightning motes in unoccupied squares in the burst. Each mote lasts until the end of the encounter or until expended. Any creature that starts its turn in a square adjacent to a lightning mote takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. Starting on your next turn, you can use the Malicious Lightning Attack power with a lightning mote, once per round.
Malicious Lightning.requirement: The power Malicious Lightning must be active in order to use this power.
Malicious Lightning.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the lightning mote pushes the secondary target 1 square.

Summon Phantasmal Killer.name: Summon Phantasmal Killer
Summon Phantasmal Killer.flavor: Your foe’s worst fears are manifested as a nightmarish monster that it cannot shake off.
keywords: Augmentable, Illusion, Implement, Psionic, Psychic, Summoning
Summon Phantasmal Killer.effect: As above, but you choose two enemies adjacent to the phantasmal killer as its prey. When both creatures chosen as the killer’s prey drop to 0 hit points, the killer disappears.
Summon Phantasmal Killer.standardAction: Melee 1; targets one creature that is the killer’s prey; Intelligence vs. Will; 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Summon Phantasmal Killer.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Will; 1d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the phantasmal killer pushes the target 1 square. If the target is the killer’s prey, it takes 2d6 extra damage and is not pushed.

Dimensional Shortcut.name: Dimensional Shortcut
Dimensional Shortcut.flavor: Your psionic power connects two points in space, allowing you and your allies to slip from one location to the other.
Dimensional Shortcut.target: You and each ally in the burst
Dimensional Shortcut.effect: Choose a square within 20 squares of you. Each target can teleport to a square within 3 squares of the square you choose as a free action.

Energy Mitigation.name: Energy Mitigation
Energy Mitigation.flavor: You summon all your mental strength to diminish the effect of a foe’s attack.
Energy Mitigation.trigger: You are hit by a close or an area attack
Energy Mitigation.effect: You take half damage from the triggering attack.

Force Barricade.name: Force Barricade
Force Barricade.flavor: A shimmering wall of force blocks attacks and movement.
Force Barricade.effect:
You conjure a solid, transparent wall of psionic force that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall can be up to 3 squares high. The wall blocks line of effect and movement. No creature can enter a wall square, and phasing creatures cannot move through it.
    The wall can be attacked, and attacks against it hit automatically. The wall has 50 hit points, and an attack on any square deals damage to the entire wall. If the wall drops to 0 hit points, the effect ends and each creature within 2 squares of the wall takes 10 force damage and falls prone.

Trace Teleport.name: Trace Teleport
Trace Teleport.flavor: You teleport by stealing the residual traces of another creature’s power.
Trace Teleport.trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you teleports
Trace Teleport.effect: You teleport the same number of squares as the triggering creature.

Brilliant Thought.name: Brilliant Thought
Brilliant Thought.flavor: The power of your mind flares brilliant white, blasting an enemy and clouding its vision.
Brilliant Thought.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude. Make the attack twice.
Brilliant Thought.onHit: 1d12 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage. If both attacks hit, the target is also blinded until the end of your next turn.

Inexplicable Attraction.name: Inexplicable Attraction
Inexplicable Attraction.flavor: Against its will, an enemy is drawn close to another creature in the aftermath of your attack.
Inexplicable Attraction.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 5 squares to a square adjacent to any creature. If the target doesn’t end its next turn adjacent to that creature, it takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Kinetic Wave.name: Kinetic Wave
Kinetic Wave.flavor: A wave of psionic force pulses out to drive nearby creatures away from you.
Kinetic Wave.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Kinetic Wave.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the start of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain, and any creature that ends its turn within the zone takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Forced Serenity.name: Forced Serenity
Forced Serenity.flavor: Your attack imbues your foe with lingering psychic energy, crippling it with pain at any sign of aggression.
Forced Serenity.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes 10 psychic damage whenever it hits with an attack (save ends).
Forced Serenity.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 psychic damage whenever it hits with an attack (save ends).

Living Barrage.name: Living Barrage
Living Barrage.flavor: You ensnare your enemies with a thought, then hurl them about like living weapons.
Living Barrage.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the secondary target and tertiary target fall prone. The secondary target takes 5 damage.
Living Barrage.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is slowed (save ends).
Living Barrage.effect: You slide the secondary target 5 squares and make the following tertiary attack against one creature adjacent to the secondary target during the slide. You cannot attack the same tertiary target more than once per round with this power.
Living Barrage.requirement: The power Living Barrage must be active in order to use this power. This power can be used once per round.
Living Barrage.secondaryTarget: One or two primary targets immobilized or slowed by the attack

Summon Thought Warrior.name: Summon Thought Warrior
Summon Thought Warrior.flavor: An idealized warrior formed of thought energy fights alongside you.
Summon Thought Warrior.effect: As above, and the warrior also has a +2 power bonus to opportunity attack rolls.
Summon Thought Warrior.standardAction: As above, and the warrior marks the target (save ends).
Summon Thought Warrior.immediateInterrupt: Triggered when a target marked by the warrior moves or shifts; melee 1; targets the triggering creature; Intelligence + 2 vs. AC; 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the warrior shifts 1 square.
Summon Thought Warrior.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence + 2 vs. AC; 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.

Thought of Unmaking.name: Thought of Unmaking
Thought of Unmaking.flavor: You reach deep into an enemy’s mind and past to undo its existence.
Thought of Unmaking.onHit: Ongoing 25 damage (save ends). If the target is bloodied or becomes bloodied while taking this ongoing damage, the ongoing damage increases by 10.
Thought of Unmaking.aftereffect: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Dream Traveler.name: Dream Traveler
Dream Traveler.flavor: By taking on the form of a creature of dreams, you bypass the barriers of the material world.
Dream Traveler.effect: You assume the form of the dream traveler until the end of the encounter or until you resume your normal form as a minor action. While you are in this form, you are insubstantial and phasing, you gain a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks, and you are weakened.

Kinetic Grasp.name: Kinetic Grasp
Kinetic Grasp.flavor: You quickly create a psychic connection to another creature that allows it to hold fast where it stands.
Kinetic Grasp.trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you is pulled, pushed, slid, or knocked prone
Kinetic Grasp.effect: The target is unaffected by the forced movement or is not knocked prone.

Mind Blank.name: Mind Blank
Mind Blank.flavor: Swirling psychic energy surrounds you and your allies, wiping your presence from your enemies’ minds.
Mind Blank.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, you and your allies are invisible to enemies within the zone.

Subjective Reality.name: Subjective Reality
Subjective Reality.flavor: You reshape the reality around you as you move freely through it.
Subjective Reality.effect: You ignore the effects of difficult terrain, challenging terrain, hindering terrain, obscured terrain, and cover until the end of your next turn.

Cerulean Cage.name: Cerulean Cage
Cerulean Cage.flavor: Ghostly shards of glowing blue surround your foe, threatening it if it attempts to move.
Cerulean Cage.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that leaves the zone takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Manifested Horror.name: Manifested Horror
Manifested Horror.flavor: Your enemy looks on you and sees its own worst nightmare, compelling it to flee or be crippled by fear.
Manifested Horror.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. If the target ends its next turn within 3 squares of you, it takes psychic damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier and you slide the target 3 squares.

Telekinetic Haze.name: Telekinetic Haze
Telekinetic Haze.flavor: A haze of psionic energy shrouds you from your enemies’ sight.
Telekinetic Haze.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
Telekinetic Haze.effect: You have concealment until the start of your next turn.

Thought Guardian.name: Thought Guardian
Thought Guardian.flavor: You scour your enemies’ thoughts to hinder their tactics, and can conjure a guardian in their midst to threaten them.
Thought Guardian.onHit: As above, and whenever the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Thought Guardian.effect: You conjure a thought guardian in an unoccupied square in the burst. The guardian lasts until the end of your next turn. You can use the Thought Guardian Attack power with the guardian.
Thought Guardian.requirement: The power Thought Guardian must be active in order to use this power.
Thought Guardian.trigger: Any creature within 3 squares of the guardian attacks you or willingly moves away from the guardian
Thought Guardian.secondaryOnHit: 5 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Cerebral Phantasm.name: Cerebral Phantasm
Cerebral Phantasm.flavor: A horrid apparition fills your enemy’s mind, letting you follow up on your allies’ attacks against that foe with a psychic barrage.
Cerebral Phantasm.effect: The target is affected by your cerebral phantasm (save ends). While the target is affected by the phantasm, you can use the Cerebral Phantasm Attack power against the target.
Cerebral Phantasm.requirement: The power Cerebral Phantasm must be active in order to use this power.
Cerebral Phantasm.trigger: The target takes damage from an ally’s attack while within 10 squares of you
Cerebral Phantasm.secondaryOnHit: 10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 psychic damage. You then slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Flowing Terrain.name: Flowing Terrain
Flowing Terrain.flavor: The surface beneath your feet flows at your command, crashing into your foes like a lethal wave.
Flowing Terrain.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is then restrained (save ends).
Flowing Terrain.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target to the nearest unoccupied square outside the blast.

Force Cube.name: Force Cube
Force Cube.flavor: You trap your foe within six impenetrable walls, then hurl this force cube across the battlefield as a weapon.
Force Cube.effect: You slide the cube and all creatures trapped in the cube 5 squares. Any creature in the cube takes 5 damage and falls prone. The cube takes 10 damage.
Force Cube.requirement: The power Force Cube must be active in order to use this power. The cube must be within 10 squares of you.
Force Cube.secondaryTarget: Each creature adjacent to the cube at the end of the slide
Force Cube.secondaryOnHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target falls prone.

Summon Mind Weirds.name: Summon Mind Weirds
Summon Mind Weirds.flavor: You call forth shadowy creatures that attack your foes with their own worst fears.
Summon Mind Weirds.effect: As above, and you can teleport any two weirds, swapping their positions, as a minor action. In addition, you can teleport yourself and one weird as a move action, swapping positions.
Summon Mind Weirds.standardAction: Melee 1; targets the weird’s prey; Intelligence vs. Will; 3d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Summon Mind Weirds.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Will; 1d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the weird pushes the target 1 square. If the target is the weird’s prey, it takes 2d6 extra damage and is not pushed.

Forceful Repositioning.name: Forceful Repositioning
Forceful Repositioning.flavor: Shimmering bands of force surround you and your allies, moving you into better positions on the battlefield.
Forceful Repositioning.target: You and each ally in the burst
Forceful Repositioning.effect: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Interdicting Thoughts.name: Interdicting Thoughts
Interdicting Thoughts.flavor: The power of your mind forms a shield protecting you and your allies from attack, even as it slows your foes.
Interdicting Thoughts.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, allies gain a +3 power bonus to all defenses. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies.

Summon Fleeting Thoughts.name: Summon Fleeting Thoughts
Summon Fleeting Thoughts.flavor: Your quick thinking summons birdlike guardians that let you and your allies soar across the battlefield.
Summon Fleeting Thoughts.effect: When a fleeting thought drops to 0 hit points, one ally within 2 squares of the thought can fly 4 squares as a free action.
Summon Fleeting Thoughts.moveAction: Melee 1; targets you or one ally; the thought and the target both fly 4 squares to adjacent squares.
Summon Fleeting Thoughts.immediateInterrupt: Triggered when an ally adjacent to the fleeting thought is hit by a melee or a ranged attack; the attack hits the fleeting thought instead.

Mind Trap.name: Mind Trap
Mind Trap.flavor: You ensnare your foe’s mind and instincts, hindering its ability to react in combat.
Mind Trap.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. Until the end of the target’s next turn, it cannot shift, make opportunity attacks, or take immediate actions.

Mindfire Explosion.name: Mindfire Explosion
Mindfire Explosion.flavor: An explosion of psionic fire scours your enemies and shrouds their sight.
Mindfire Explosion.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Phantom Burden.name: Phantom Burden
Phantom Burden.flavor: You crush your enemies under the weight of their own uncertainty, hindering their movement.
Phantom Burden.onHit: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage. If the target moves more than 1 square on its next turn, it falls prone at the end of the move and takes 5 damage.
Phantom Burden.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies.

Prismatic Swarms.name: Prismatic Swarms
Prismatic Swarms.flavor: You leave your foe surrounded by swirling motes of psionic energy that hinder its attacks.
Prismatic Swarms.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you slide the target 3 squares or knock it prone. The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Far Realm's Embrace.name: Far Realm's Embrace
Far Realm's Embrace.flavor: You tear aside the veil to the Far Realm, calling forth phantasmal tentacles that attack and ensnare all creatures in their reach.
Far Realm's Embrace.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the primary target is restrained and takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends both).
Far Realm's Embrace.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends both).
Far Realm's Embrace.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Until the zone ends, you can use the Far Realm's Embrace Attack power with the zone.
Far Realm's Embrace.sustainMinor: You take 5 psychic damage and the zone persists.
Far Realm's Embrace.requirement: The power Far Realm's Embrace must be active in order to use this power.
Far Realm's Embrace.trigger: A creature starts its turn in a square adjacent to or within the zone
Far Realm's Embrace.secondaryOnHit: 10 + Intelligence modifier damage, the zone pulls the secondary target 1 square toward the zone’s origin, and the secondary target is immobilized (save ends).

Recall Agony.name: Recall Agony
Recall Agony.flavor: An enemy’s suffering allows you to twist its mind to an even greater state of agony.
Recall Agony.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you takes damage from an attack
Recall Agony.onHit: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. If this attack deals less damage than the triggering attack, the target takes ongoing psychic damage equal to the difference (save ends).

Summon Emerald Terror.name: Summon Emerald Terror
Summon Emerald Terror.flavor: Your foes’ greatest fears come to life as a hulking emerald terror, its glistening skin reflecting the nightmares of its victims.
Summon Emerald Terror.effect: As above, and the terror also has a +2 power bonus to damage rolls. In addition, any creature the terror hits with a melee attack takes a -2 penalty to its next saving throw made before the end of its next turn.
Summon Emerald Terror.standardAction: Close burst 2; targets each enemy in the burst; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the terror pushes the target 3 squares and knocks it prone.
Summon Emerald Terror.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. AC; 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the terror slides the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to the terror.

Thought Hammer.name: Thought Hammer
Thought Hammer.flavor: Your thoughts become a wave of force that hammers foes to the ground.
Thought Hammer.onHit: 4d12 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone.

Decerebrate.name: Decerebrate
Decerebrate.flavor: Your attack burns out your enemy’s mind and can leave it reeling in pain.
Decerebrate.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Decerebrate.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a ranged basic attack.

Hail of Crystals.name: Hail of Crystals
Hail of Crystals.flavor: Your psionic power manifests as a cloud of crystal shards, obscuring the senses and slashing at creatures that move within it.
Hail of Crystals.effect: As above, and you can move the zone a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a move action. When the zone ends, each creature within the zone takes 15 damage.

Kinetic Detonation.name: Kinetic Detonation
Kinetic Detonation.flavor: A pulse of force explodes in the midst of combat, scattering victims in all directions.
Kinetic Detonation.onHit: 2d12 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares from the center of the burst equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Reality Meltdown.name: Reality Meltdown
Reality Meltdown.flavor: A shimmering orb of molten psionic essence sears foes that linger too close.
Reality Meltdown.effect: You conjure a molten orb in an unoccupied square within range. The orb lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the orb’s space or starts its turn there takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). In addition, you can use the Reality Meltdown Attack power with the orb.
Reality Meltdown.requirement: The power Reality Meltdown must be active in order to use this power.
Reality Meltdown.trigger: An enemy starts its turn within 5 squares of the molten orb
Reality Meltdown.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and you move the orb 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Consuming Psychosis.name: Consuming Psychosis
Consuming Psychosis.flavor: A burst of psychic energy inflicts a pain so potent that your foes lash out blindly in their madness.
Consuming Psychosis.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Consuming Psychosis.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Consuming Psychosis.effect: When the target takes ongoing psychic damage from this attack, it makes a melee basic attack against a random creature as a free action. If it cannot make a melee attack against any creature, it targets itself with a melee basic attack.

Hurl into Heaven.name: Hurl into Heaven
Hurl into Heaven.flavor: You cast your enemies into the air, then drop them with lethal results.
Hurl into Heaven.onHit: You lift the target 5 to 50 feet into the air, where it is restrained until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, the target drops to the ground in the space it last occupied, taking 3d10 + Intelligence modifier damage and dealing 20 damage to any creature on the ground beneath it.
Hurl into Heaven.onMiss: You lift the target 5 feet into the air, where it is restrained until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, the target drops to the ground, taking 1d10 + Intelligence modifier damage and dealing 10 damage to any creature on the ground beneath it.

Ravenous Singularity.name: Ravenous Singularity
Ravenous Singularity.flavor: A dark vortex appears on the battlefield at your command, hindering movement as it draws all creatures toward it.
Ravenous Singularity.effect: You conjure a ravenous singularity in the burst’s origin square. The singularity lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 squares of the singularity is pulled 2 squares toward the singularity. Until the singularity ends, when a creature fails a saving throw against the immobilized or slowed condition imposed by this power, that creature is pulled into the singularity, takes 20 damage, and is removed from play (save ends). When the target saves, it reappears in any unoccupied space of its choice within 3 squares of the singularity.
Ravenous Singularity.sustainMinor: The singularity persists, and it pulls you 1 square.

Summon Thought Champion.name: Summon Thought Champion
Summon Thought Champion.flavor: You call forth an ideal champion from your allies’ minds, granting it access to their powers.
Summon Thought Champion.effect: As above, and the champion also has a +3 power bonus to damage rolls. Its standard action special command can use at-will attack powers from any conscious or unconscious ally within 20 squares of the champion.
Summon Thought Champion.standardAction: The thought champion uses an at-will attack power of one conscious ally you can see. It uses the ally’s ability modifiers for the attack.
Summon Thought Champion.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence + 2 vs. Reflex; 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage.

Insidious Doubt.name: Insidious Doubt
Insidious Doubt.flavor: You fan doubt’s fire in your enemy’s mind until indecision blocks every action it would take.
Insidious Doubt.onHit: As above, but the target also takes the damage if it uses a move action.

Static Mote.name: Static Mote
Static Mote.flavor: A mote of roiling lightning hinders your foes before exploding in a devastating burst.
Static Mote.effect: You conjure a static mote in an unoccupied square within range. Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the mote is slowed until the end of its turn. At the start of your next turn, the mote disappears and you use the Static Mote Attack power.
Static Mote.requirement: This power follows the use of the power Static Mote.

Void Shard.name: Void Shard
Void Shard.flavor: A shard of nothingness holds fast any creature that slips too close.
Void Shard.effect: As above, and when the void shard is conjured, it uses the Void Shard Attack power as a free action, with the range Close burst 3.
Void Shard.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is both dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn
Void Shard.requirement: The power Void Shard must be active in order to use this power.
Void Shard.special: You can take this free action only as the first action of your turn.

Telepathic Wail.name: Telepathic Wail
Telepathic Wail.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Telepathic Wail.flavor: You project a keening psychic scream into the minds around you and rob nearby creatures of hearing.
Telepathic Wail.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is deafened and dazed until the end of your next turn. If the target deals psychic damage before the end of your next turn, it is stunned instead of dazed.
